details:
GNOME Nettool is a network information tool which provides user interfaces for
 some of the most common command line network tools including:
    * ifconfig
    * ping
    * netstat
    * traceroute
    * port scanning
    * DNS lookup
    * finger
    * whois
 protocol::ip, role::program, scope::application, suite::gnome,
 uitoolkit::gtk, x11::application
